message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a limited time. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the excitement around it, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider reducing the price to $175?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you consider $190 for the product?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the effort. I would like to propose $180 as my maximum price for the product.
I'm getting close to your target price, Bob! I can offer you $185 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
